org.un.bungeni.translators.odttoakn.translator
Interface TranslatorInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Translator
public interface TranslatorInterface

This is the interface for the ODTtoAKN translator. It has only a method that simply takes the path of the configuration and the path of the document to translate and translate the document.

Method Summary
 java.io.File translate(java.lang.String aDocumentPath, java.lang.String aConfigurationPath)
          Transforms the document at the given path using the configuration at the given path
